sentence.Network_en: Some redistribution of income can help to keep the worse off out of poverty.
sentence.Network_cn: 某种形式的收入再分配可以帮助穷人脱贫。

sentence.Network_en: Redistribution of land was a fundamental of Red policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 重新分配土地是红区政策中的一个根本要素.

sentence.Network_en: The most direct approach to income redistribution is to levy progressive taxes.
sentence.Network_cn: 收入再分配的最直接的方法就是推行累进税.

entry.def: If something such as money or property is redistributed, it is shared among people or organizations in a different way from the way that it was previously shared.

example.ex: Wealth was redistributed more equitably among society...
example.tran: 财富实现了在社会中更加公平地再分配。

example.ex: Taxes could be used to redistribute income.
example.tran: 税收可以用来对收入进行再分配。

sentences.sentence: "the revolution resulted in a redistribution of wealth"

auth_sentence.content: Mr. President, your entire campaign platform was redistribution.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. President, your entire campaign platform was redistribution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. President, your entire campaign platform was redistribution.

auth_sentence.content: Now that's a real redistribution of wealth!
auth_sentence.res_content: Now that's a real redistribution of wealth!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now that's a real redistribution of wealth!

auth_sentence.content: He believes in greater redistribution of a much smaller pie.
auth_sentence.res_content: He believes in greater redistribution of a much smaller pie.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He believes in greater redistribution of a much smaller pie.
